meanings.definition: A person who works hard to achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: The strivers in our class always complete their homework on time.
meanings.sent2: Successful companies often have dedicated strivers among their employees.
meanings.sent3: The group of strivers decided to challenge themselves by climbing a mountain on the weekend.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, the strivers are the ones who push themselves to the limit to reach victory.
meanings.sent5: The image of the strivers sweating and toiling in the field stayed with me long after the game ended.

meanings.definition: Those who make great efforts to succeed.
meanings.sent1: The strivers in the marathon trained hard every day to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent2: In a competitive environment, the strivers stand out with their determination and hard work.
meanings.sent3: The group of strivers decided to have a race to see who could reach the park first.
meanings.sent4: The strivers in the business world are like arrows aiming straight for their targets.
meanings.sent5: The image of the strivers striving for success is truly inspiring to witness.
